﻿ <h>Dɔlɔminbana</h> <h>I.﻿ <h> Dɔlɔminbanadɔlɔminbanandɔ̀lɔminnconsommation.d'alcooldɔ̀lɔnbière.de.milmìnvboirebànanmaladie </h> <h> IIn.propIípersREFLípers2SG . ɲɛbila</h> Dɔlɔ ye fɛn ye, min ye ne dabaliya ban.ɲɛbilaɲɛ́bilanguideɲɛ́noeilbìlanabandon </h> Dɔlɔdɔ̀lɔnbière.de.mil yeyécopEQU fɛnfɛ́nnchose yeyéppPP , minmínprnREL yeyépmPFV.TR nenêpers1SG.EMPH dabaliyadabaliyandàbalinmoyenyamrphABSTR banbánvterminer . Biko ma dɔlɔ bila diɲɛ na.Bikobikonbìnaujourd'huikónaffaire mamápmPFV.NEG dɔlɔdɔ̀lɔnbière.de.mil bilabìlavmettre diɲɛdíɲɛnmonde nanáppdans . A dɔnnen don diɲɛ seleke naani bɛɛ kɔnɔ.Aàpers3SG dɔnnendɔnnenptcpdɔ́nvconnaîtrenenmrphPTCP.RES dondòncopPRES diɲɛdíɲɛnmonde selekesélekenangle naanináaninumquatre bɛɛbɛ́ɛdtmtout kɔnɔkɔ́nɔppà.l’intérieur . A bɛ min kɛ mɔgɔ la, bɛɛ b’o dɔn, nka fɛn don min masala man di mɔgɔ si ye k’a ta dɔlɔminna na ka taa bila dɔlɔfeerela la, k’a ta dɔlɔ dilanna na ka taa a bila dɔlɔminbali la, mɔgɔ si t’a fɛ ka dɔlɔ mankutu fɔ.Aàpers3SG bɛbɛ́pmIPFV.AFF minmínprnREL kɛkɛ́vfaire mɔgɔmɔ̀gɔnhomme laláppdans , bɛɛbɛ́ɛprnchaque b’b'pmIPFV.AFF oòprnce dɔndɔ́nvconnaître , nkankáconjmais fɛnfɛ́nnchose dondòncopPRES minmínprnREL masalamásalancauserie manmánpmQUAL.NEG didívqagréable mɔgɔmɔ̀gɔnhomme sisídtmaucun yeyéppPP k’k'pmINF aàpers3SG tatàvprendre dɔlɔminnadɔ̀lɔminnanivrognedɔ̀lɔnbière.de.milmìnvboirenamrphAG.PRM nanáppdans kakàpmINF taatáavaller bilabìlanabandon dɔlɔfeereladɔlɔfeerelandɔ̀lɔnbière.de.milfèerevvendrelamrphAG.PRM laláppdans , k’k'pmINF aàpers3SG tatàvprendre dɔlɔdɔ̀lɔnbière.de.mil dilannadilannandílanvfabriquernamrphAG.PRM nanáppdans kakàpmINF taatáavaller aàpers3SG bilabìlavmettre dɔlɔminbalidɔlɔminbalindɔ̀lɔminnconsommation.d'alcooldɔ̀lɔnbière.de.milmìnvboirebalimrphPTCP.PRIV laláppdans , mɔgɔmɔ̀gɔnhomme sisídtmaucun t’t'copCOP.NEG aàpers3SG fɛfɛ̀ppvers kakàpmINF dɔlɔdɔ̀lɔnbière.de.mil mankutumànkutunrenom fɔfɔ́vdire . Wa dɔlɔminnaba ka ko man di mɔgɔ si ye: a somɔgɔw, a teriw, a jɛɲɔgɔnw, hali mɔgɔw minnu t’a dɔn olu bɛ ɲigin a la n’u y’a tɛmɛtɔ ye.Wawàprtbon dɔlɔminnabadɔlɔminnabanivrogne.AUG kakáconjPOSS kokónaffaire manmánpmQUAL.NEG didívqagréable mɔgɔmɔ̀gɔnhomme sisídtmaucun yeyéppPP : aàpers3SG somɔgɔwsomɔgɔwnsómɔgɔnpersonne.de.la.famillesónmaisonmɔ̀gɔnhommewmrphPL , aàpers3SG teriwteriwntérinamiwmrphPL , aàpers3SG jɛɲɔgɔnwjɛɲɔgɔnwnjɛ̀ɲɔgɔnnassociéjɛ̀vassemblerɲɔ́gɔnprnRECPwmrphPL , haliháliprtmême mɔgɔwmɔgɔwnmɔ̀gɔnhommewmrphPL minnumínnuprnREL.PL2mínprnRELnúmrphPL2 t’t'copCOP.NEG aàpers3SG dɔndɔ́nvconnaître oluòlúpersce.PL2òprncelúmrphPL2 bɛbɛ́pmIPFV.AFF ɲiginɲíginvavoir.la.nausée aàpers3SG laláppdans n’n'conjsi uùpers3PL y’y'pmPFV.TR aàpers3SG tɛmɛtɔtɛmɛtɔptcptɛ̀mɛvpassertɔmrphPTCP.PROG yeyévvoir . Wa a ka ca a la i b’a sɔrɔ a ko man di a yɛrɛ ye.Wawàprtbon aàpers3SG kakápmQUAL.AFF cacávqnombreux aàpers3SG laláppdans iípers2SG b’b'pmIPFV.AFF aàpers3SG sɔrɔsɔ̀rɔvobtenir aàpers3SG kokónaffaire manmánpmQUAL.NEG didívqagréable aàpers3SG yɛrɛyɛ̀rɛ̂dtmmême yeyéppPP . Anw fɛ yan, n’i ye mɔgɔ caman ɲininka fɛn min ye dɔlɔminbana ye, bɛɛ b’i ta fɔ.Anwánwpers1PL.EMPH fɛfɛ̀ppvers yanyànadv/nici , n’n'conjsi iípersREFL yeyépmPFV.TR mɔgɔmɔ̀gɔnhomme camancámanadjnombreuxcávqnombreuxmanmrphADJ ɲininkaɲìninkavinterroger fɛnfɛ́nnchose minmíndtmREL yeyécopEQU dɔlɔminbanadɔlɔminbanandɔ̀lɔminnconsommation.d'alcooldɔ̀lɔnbière.de.milmìnvboirebànanmaladie yeyéppPP , bɛɛbɛ́ɛdtmtout b’b'pmIPFV.AFF iípersREFL tatánpropriété fɔfɔ́vdire . Dɔ n’a fɔ ko delina don dɔlɔ la fo ka taa se yɔrɔ ma, i tɛ se ka ɲɛ a kɔ bilen; dɔw ko minnu bɛ min kɛ fo k’u bɔ k’u bin duguma k’olu de ye dɔlɔmibanagatɔw ye; dɔw yɛrɛ fana b’a fɔ ko minnu bɛ ɲɔdɔlɔ ani “duwɛn” min, k’olu de man kɛnɛ.Dɔdɔ́dtmcertain n’n'pmCERT aàpers3SG fɔfɔ́vdire kokócopQUOT delinadèlinanhabitudedèlinhabitudenamrphMNT1 dondòncopPRES dɔlɔdɔ̀lɔnbière.de.mil laláppdans fofóprep/conjjusqu'à kakàpmINF taatáavaller sesévarriver yɔrɔyɔ́rɔnlieu mamàppà , iípers2SG tɛtɛ́pmIPFV.NEG sesévarriver kakàpmINF ɲɛɲɛ̀vréussir aàpers3SG kɔkɔ́ppaprès bilenbìlenadvencore ; dɔwdɔwdtmdɔ́dtmcertainwmrphPL kokócopQUOT minnumínnuprnREL.PL2mínprnRELnúmrphPL2 bɛbɛ́pmIPFV.AFF minmìnnboire kɛkɛ́vfaire fofóprep/conjjusqu'à k’k'pmINF uùpers3PL bɔbɔ́vsortir k’k'pmINF uùpers3PL binbìnvtomber dugumadugumandùgunterremamrphCOM k’k'copQUOT oluòlúpersce.PL2òprncelúmrphPL2 dedèprtFOC yeyécopEQU dɔlɔmibanagatɔwdɔlɔminbanagatɔwndɔ̀lɔminnconsommation.d'alcooldɔ̀lɔnbière.de.milbànabagatɔnmaladebànanmaladiebagamrphAG.OCCtɔmrphSTwmrphPL yeyéppPP ; dɔwdɔwdtmdɔ́dtmcertainwmrphPL yɛrɛyɛ̀rɛ̂dtmmême fanafánaprtaussi b’b'pmIPFV.AFF aàpers3SG fɔfɔ́vdire kokócopQUOT minnumínnuprnREL.PL2mínprnRELnúmrphPL2 bɛbɛ́pmIPFV.AFF ɲɔdɔlɔɲɔdɔlɔnɲɔ̀nmildɔ̀lɔnbière.de.mil aniàniprep/conjainsi.que “ duwɛnduwɛnnETRG.FRA ” minmìnvboire , k’k'copQUOT oluòlúpersce.PL2òprncelúmrphPL2 dedèprtFOC manmánpmQUAL.NEG kɛnɛkɛ́nɛvq/adjen.bonne.santé . Nsan ka maana</h> Ce dɔ tun bɛ yen, a tun tɔgɔ kɔ Nsan.NsanNsànn.propNOM.M kakáconjPOSS maanamáananexposé </h> CeCɛ̀nmâle dɔdɔ́dtmcertain tuntùnprtPST bɛbɛ́copBE yenyènadv/nlà-bas , aàpers3SG tuntùnprtPST tɔgɔtɔ́gɔnnom kɔkócopQUOT NsanNsànn.propNOM.M . N’aw y’aw kɛrɛw filɛ, aw bɛ Nsan ɲɔgɔnna caman ye: somɔgɔkunda, terila, sigiɲɔgɔnna, jɛnɲɔgɔnna, baarakɛyɔrɔ la.N’n'conjsi awáwpers2PL.EMPH y’y'pmPFV.TR awáwpers2PL.EMPH kɛrɛwkɛrɛwnkɛ̀rɛncôtéwmrphPL filɛfílɛvregarder , awáwpers2PL.EMPH bɛbɛ́pmIPFV.AFF NsanNsànn.propNOM.M ɲɔgɔnnaɲɔ̀gɔnnanpareil camancámanadjnombreuxcávqnombreuxmanmrphADJ yeyévvoir : somɔgɔkundasomɔgɔkundansómɔgɔnpersonne.de.la.famillesónmaisonmɔ̀gɔnhommekùndangroupe.socialkùnntêtedánbouche , terilaterilantérinamilamrphLOC , sigiɲɔgɔnnasigiɲɔgɔnnansìgiɲɔgɔnnvoisinsìginposition.assiseɲɔ́gɔnprnRECPnamrphLOC , jɛnɲɔgɔnnajɛnɲɔgɔnnanjɛ̀nvassemblerɲɔ̀gɔnnanpareil , baarakɛyɔrɔbaarakɛyɔrɔnbáarantravailkɛ́vfaireyɔ́rɔnlieu laláppdans . <h>III.<h> IIIiiiiiiviviviviiiadjiadjiadjiadj . Dɔlɔminbana ye mun ye?</h> Kabini bunahadamaden ye dɔlɔmin daminɛ, a ni dɔlɔminbana kɛra ɲɔgɔn na.Dɔlɔminbanadɔlɔminbanandɔ̀lɔminnconsommation.d'alcooldɔ̀lɔnbière.de.milmìnvboirebànanmaladie yeyécopEQU munmùnprnquoi yeyéppPP ? </h> Kabinikàbiniprep/conjdepuiskàbiprep/conjdepuisníconjsi bunahadamadenbúnahadamadennhumainhádamadennhumaindénnenfant yeyépmPFV.TR dɔlɔmindɔ̀lɔminnconsommation.d'alcooldɔ̀lɔnbière.de.milmìnvboire daminɛdámìnɛvcommencerdánbouchemìnɛvattraper , aàpers3SG niníprep/conjet dɔlɔminbanadɔlɔminbanandɔ̀lɔminnconsommation.d'alcooldɔ̀lɔnbière.de.milmìnvboirebànanmaladie kɛrakɛravkɛ́vfaireramrphPFV.INTR ɲɔgɔnɲɔ́gɔnprnRECP nanáppdans . Fo bi, a ma se ka kunbɛncogo si sɔrɔ a la.Fofóprep/conjjusqu'à bibìadv/naujourd'hui , aàpers3SG mamápmPFV.NEG sesévarriver kakàpmINF kunbɛncogokunbɛncogonkùnbɛ̀nvrencontrerkùnntêtebɛ̀nvse.rencontrercógonmanière sisídtmaucun sɔrɔsɔ̀rɔvobtenir aàpers3SG laláppdans . U taara fɛn dɔ sɔrɔ mɔgɔ dɔw kunkolo la, dɔlɔminbana kɛra minnu sata ye, o fɛn kelen nin bɛ sɔrɔ nisɔndiyafuranin na, a bɛ fɔ min ma ko “Heroyini”, k’o de bɛ yen, a mugulama, i n’a fɔ ko mɔgɔ dɔ de ye u kun dayɛlɛ k’a kɛ yen, k’u to ni na.Uùpers3PL taarataaravtáavallerramrphPFV.INTR fɛnfɛ́nnchose dɔdɔ́dtmcertain sɔrɔsɔ̀rɔvobtenir mɔgɔmɔ̀gɔnhomme dɔwdɔwdtmdɔ́dtmcertainwmrphPL kunkolokùnkoloncrânekùnntêtekólonos laláppdans , dɔlɔminbanadɔlɔminbanandɔ̀lɔminnconsommation.d'alcooldɔ̀lɔnbière.de.milmìnvboirebànanmaladie kɛrakɛravkɛ́vfaireramrphPFV.INTR minnumínnuprnREL.PL2mínprnRELnúmrphPL2 satasátancause.d'un.décès yeyéppPP , oòdtmce fɛnfɛ́nnchose kelenkélennumun ninnìndtmDEM bɛbɛ́pmIPFV.AFF sɔrɔsɔ̀rɔvobtenir nisɔndiyafuraninnísɔndiyafuraninndroguení.sɔn.di.yanjoiení.sɔnnhumeurnínâmesɔ̀nncœurdívqagréableyamrphABSTRfúranfeuilleninmrphDIM nanáppdans , aàpers3SG bɛbɛ́pmIPFV.AFF fɔfɔ́vdire minmínprnREL mamàppà kokócopQUOT “ HeroyiniHeroyininETRG.FRA ” , k’k'copQUOT oòprnce dedèprtFOC bɛbɛ́copBE yenyènadv/nlà-bas , aàpers3SG mugulamamugulamanréduire.en.poudre.STAT , iípers2SG n’n'pmCERT aàpers3SG fɔfɔ́vdire kokócopQUOT mɔgɔmɔ̀gɔnhomme dɔdɔ́dtmcertain dedèprtFOC yeyépmPFV.TR uùpers3PL kunkùnntête dayɛlɛdáyɛ̀lɛvouvrirdánboucheyɛ̀lɛvouvrir k’k'pmINF aàpers3SG kɛkɛ́vfaire yenyènadv/nlà-bas , k’k'pmINF uùpers3PL totóvrester ninìprnceci nanáppdans . Jigitigɛ bɛna tuma min na n’u y’a ye k’a fɔ k’u y’u ka sɛgɛn ni muɲu bɛɛ kɛ fu la.Jigitigɛjìgitigɛndésillusionjìginespoirtìgɛvcouper bɛnabɛ́nàpmFUT tumatùmanmoment minmíndtmREL nanáppdans n’n'conjsi uùpers3PL y’y'pmPFV.TR aàpers3SG yeyévvoir k’k'pmINF aàpers3SG fɔfɔ́vdire k’k'copQUOT uùpers3PL y’y'pmPFV.TR uùpers3PL kakáconjPOSS sɛgɛnsɛ́gɛnnconsidération niníprep/conjet muɲumùɲunpatience bɛɛbɛ́ɛdtmtout kɛkɛ́vfaire fufúnzéro laláppdans . Ni o jigitigɛ ɲɔgɔn ye aw sɔrɔ, ka ɲɛsin aw ka mɔgɔ dɔ ma, aw bɛ se ka nin gafe kɔnɔna lajɛ k’a dɔn sɔnja ni dusukasi ni ɲani min bɛ dɔlɔminnabagatɔ ka jɛɲɔgɔnya la, hali k’a dan a dimi lankolon n’a kɛlɛ banbaliw ma, walima k’i ka du citɔ ye, ani wari min bɛ tiɲɛ dɔlɔ la k’a sɔrɔ balo tɛ, walima ka denw lamɔ denbaya kɔnɔ, balawu ni sitanɛ ni gɛrɛgɛrɛ tɛ ban yɔrɔ min na.Niníconjsi oòdtmce jigitigɛjìgitigɛndésillusionjìginespoirtìgɛvcouper ɲɔgɔnɲɔ̀gɔnnpareil yeyépmPFV.TR awáwpers2PL.EMPH sɔrɔsɔ̀rɔvobtenir , kakàpmINF ɲɛsinɲɛ́sínvs'orienterɲɛ́noeilsínvdiriger awáwpers2PL.EMPH Dɔlɔminbana taamasiyɛn</h> Dɔlɔminbana taamasiyɛn fɔlɔ ye k’a fɔ ko banabaatɔ tɛ se cogoya si la ka dɔlɔ min k’a dan hakɛ la.Dɔlɔminbanadɔlɔminbanandɔ̀lɔminnconsommation.d'alcooldɔ̀lɔnbière.de.milmìnvboirebànanmaladie taamasiyɛntaamasiyɛnntáamanvoyagesìyɛnnpas </h> Dɔlɔminbanadɔlɔminbanandɔ̀lɔminnconsommation.d'alcooldɔ̀lɔnbière.de.milmìnvboirebànanmaladie taamasiyɛntaamasiyɛnntáamanvoyagesìyɛnnpas fɔlɔfɔ́lɔadjpremier yeyécopEQU k’k'pmINF aàpers3SG fɔfɔ́vdire kokócopQUOT banabaatɔbànabaatɔadj/nmaladebànanmaladiebaamrphAG.OCCtɔmrphST tɛtɛ́pmIPFV.NEG sesévarriver cogoyacógoyanmanièrecógonmanièreyamrphABSTR sisídtmaucun laláppdans kakàpmINF dɔlɔdɔ̀lɔnbière.de.mil minmìnvboire k’k'pmINF aàpers3SG dandànvs'arrêter hakɛhákɛnmesure laláppdans . Dɔlɔminbanabagatɔw bɛɛ ka taamasiyɛnw tɛ kelen ye.Dɔlɔminbanabagatɔwdɔlɔminbanabagatɔwndɔ̀lɔminnconsommation.d'alcooldɔ̀lɔnbière.de.milmìnvboirebàna.baga.tɔadj/nmaladebànanmaladiebagamrphAG.OCCtɔmrphSTwmrphPL bɛɛbɛ́ɛdtmtout kakáconjPOSS taamasiyɛnwtaamasiyɛnwntáamanvoyagesìyɛnnpaswmrphPL tɛtɛ́copCOP.NEG kelenkélennumun yeyéppPP . Nka u caman bɛ yen, u ka bana kɔnɔna na, u bɛ taamasiyɛn ninnu jira: dɔlɔ dɔrɔn de bɛ se ka kɛ n’u bɛ da u yɛrɛw la, an’u ka se k’u yɛrɛ walanwalan jama na; n’u bɛ ɲɛnajɛyɔrɔ la, u ka sɔrɔ u ma a dabɔ a kama; u b’a lajɛ k’u yɛrɛw minɛ tuma dɔw la, u b’a fɔ k’u bɛ waati kɛ dɔlɔ ko, walima k’u y’a bila pewu, nka u b’u dogo k’a min; u tɛ tiɲɛ fɔ u ka dɔlɔmin kan; u bɛ dɔlɔbuteliw dogo; u bɛ dɔlɔ min u ka baarayɔrɔw la; u kelen bɛ dɔlɔ min; u bɛ to ka ɲinɛ (k’a sababu kɛ u hakili tɛ se ka jigin u ka kunun fɔtaw ani u ka kɛwalew la); u bɛ soli ka dɔlɔ min walasa k’u fari foni ka bɔ ɲɔgɔn na, walima jatigɛ ni nimisa min b’u la k’o gɛn; u bɛ ɲinɛ dumuniwaatiw kɔ wa u tɛ dumuni kɛ ka ɲɛ; biɲɛdimi b’u mina; u bɛ yɛrɛyɛrɛ kosɛbɛ, n’i ye dɔlɔ bɔsi u la u hakili bɛ ɲagami.Nkankáconjmais uùpers3PL camancámanadjnombreuxcávqnombreuxmanmrphADJ bɛbɛ́copBE yenyènadv/nlà-bas , uùpers3PL kakáconjPOSS banabànanmaladie kɔnɔnakɔ́nɔnanl'intérieurkɔ́nɔnventrenamrphLOC nanáppdans , uùpers3PL bɛbɛ́pmIPFV.AFF taamasiyɛntaamasiyɛnntáamanvoyagesìyɛnnpas ninnunìnnúdtm/prnDEM.PLnìndtm/prnDEMnúmrphPL2 jirajìravmontrer : dɔlɔdɔ̀lɔnbière.de.mil dɔrɔndɔ́rɔndtmseulement dedèprtFOC bɛbɛ́pmIPFV.AFF sesévarriver kakàpmINF kɛkɛ́vfaire n’n'conjsi uùpers3PL bɛbɛ́pmIPFV.AFF dadávposer uùpers3PL yɛrɛwyɛrɛwdtmyɛ̀rɛ̂dtmmêmewmrphPL laláppdans , an’àn'prep/conjainsi.que uùpers3PL kakápmSBJV sesévarriver k’k'pmINF uùpers3PL yɛrɛyɛ̀rɛ̂dtmmême walanwalanwálanwalanvdérouler jamajàmanfoule nanáppdans ; Ka jɛ n’a ye ko dɔlɔminbana b’e la, hali n’o jɛlen bɛ ani siga fosi tɛ o la, o kɔrɔ k’e ka fɛn dɔ kɛ walasa k’o kunbɛn.KakàpmINF jɛjɛ́vblanchir n’n'prep/conjet aàpers3SG yeyéppPP kokócopQUOT dɔlɔminbanadɔlɔminbanandɔ̀lɔminnconsommation.d'alcooldɔ̀lɔnbière.de.milmìnvboirebànanmaladie b’b'copBE eêpers2SG.EMPH laláppdans , haliháliprtmême n’n'conjsi oòdtmce jɛlenjɛlenptcpjɛ́vblanchirlenmrphPTCP.RES bɛbɛ́copBE aniàniprep/conjainsi.que sigasígandoute fosifósinrien tɛtɛ́copCOP.NEG oòprnce laláppdans , oòdtmce kɔrɔkɔ́rɔndessous k’k'copQUOT eêpers2SG.EMPH kakápmSBJV fɛnfɛ́nnchose dɔdɔ́dtmcertain kɛkɛ́vfaire walasawálasaconjpour.que k’k'pmINF oòprnce kunbɛnkùnbɛ̀nvrencontrerkùnntêtebɛ̀nvse.rencontrer . Dɔlɔminbana kɛnɛyacogo</h> N’a fɔra ko kɛnɛyali, ne kan bɛka segin i yɛrɛ ma ka kɛ hɔrɔn ye, ka fɛɛrɛ sɔrɔ fɛn min b’a to n’e bɛ se ka segin hadamadenya sira fɛ, k’i ka diɲɛ tɔ kɛ ni hɛrɛ ani baden ye.Dɔlɔminbanadɔlɔminbanandɔ̀lɔminnconsommation.d'alcooldɔ̀lɔnbière.de.milmìnvboirebànanmaladie kɛnɛyacogokɛnɛyacogonkɛ́nɛyanbonne.santékɛ́nɛvq/adjen.bonne.santéyamrphDEQUcógonmanière </h> N’n'conjsi aàpers3SG fɔrafɔravfɔ́vdireramrphPFV.INTR kokócopQUOT kɛnɛyalikɛnɛyalinkɛ́nɛyavguérirkɛ́nɛvq/adjen.bonne.santéyamrphDEQUlimrphNMLZ , nenêpers1SG.EMPH kankánncou bɛkabɛ́kàpmPROG.AFF seginsèginvrevenir iípers2SG yɛrɛyɛ̀rɛ̂dtmmême mamàppà kakàpmINF kɛkɛ́vfaire hɔrɔnhɔ́rɔnadj/nlibre yeyéppPP , kakàpmINF fɛɛrɛfɛ̀ɛrɛnmoyen sɔrɔsɔ̀rɔvobtenir fɛnfɛ́nnchose minmíndtmREL b’b'pmIPFV.AFF aàpers3SG totóvrester n’n'conjsi eêpers2SG.EMPH bɛbɛ́pmIPFV.AFF sesévarriver kakàpmINF seginsèginvrevenir hadamadenyahádamaden.yanhumanitéhádamadennhumainyamrphABSTR sirasíranchemin fɛfɛ̀ppvers , k’k'pmINF iípers2SG kakáconjPOSS diɲɛdíɲɛnmonde tɔtɔ̀nle.reste kɛkɛ́vfaire niníprep/conjet hɛrɛhɛ́rɛnpaix aniàniprep/conjainsi.que badenbádennfrère/soeur.utérin(e)bánmèredénnenfant yeyéppPP . Kuncɛli</h> Nin bɛɛ lajɛlen tɛmɛnnen kɔ, an bɛ se ka mun kɛ ka nin kuma ninnu kuncɛ?Kuncɛlikuncɛlinkùncɛ̀vterminerkùnntêtecɛ̀vramasserlimrphNMLZ </h> Ninnìnprnceci bɛɛbɛ́ɛdtmtout lajɛlenlajɛlenptcplájɛ̀vréunirlámrphCAUSjɛ̀vassemblerlenmrphPTCP.RES tɛmɛnnentɛmɛnnenptcptɛ̀mɛnvpassernenmrphPTCP.RES kɔkɔ́ppaprès , anánpers1PL bɛbɛ́pmIPFV.AFF sesévarriver kakàpmINF munmunprnREL kɛkɛ́vfaire kakàpmINF ninnìnprnceci kumakúmanparole ninnunìnnúdtm/prnDEM.PLnìndtm/prnDEMnúmrphPL2 kuncɛkùncɛ̀vterminerkùnntêtecɛ̀vramasser ? Alikoli kelen min kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenyalen bɛ min kama, o ye u b’a fɔ min ma ko “etanɔli”, o min filɛ nin ye, a jirala k’a fɔ ko mɔgɔ min girinya bɛ kilo 75, o tigi farisogo bɛ se, n’i ye duw in litiri tila naani ye, “etanɔli” nin bɛ duwin na, ka o sigiyɔrɔma kelen d’a ma a ko min, k’o ma yɛlɛma lɛrɛ fila kɔnɔ k’a sɔrɔ a ma kɛ baasi si ye a tigi ma.AlikolialikolinETRG.FRA kelenkélennumun minmìnnboire kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenyalenkɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenyalenptcpkɛ́rɛnkɛrɛnvmettre.de.côténenmrphPTCP.RESyamrphABSTRlenmrphPTCP.RES bɛbɛ́copBE minmínprnREL kamakámàpppourkánncoumàppà , oòprnce yeyécopEQU uùpers3PL b’b'pmIPFV.AFF aàpers3SG fɔfɔ́vdire minmínprnREL mamàppà kokócopQUOT “ etanɔlietanɔlinETRG.FRA ” , oòprnce minmíndtmREL filɛfílɛvregarder ninnìnprnceci yeyéppPP , aàpers3SG jiralajìralavjìravmontrerlamrphPFV.INTR k’k'pmINF aàpers3SG fɔfɔ́vdire kokócopQUOT mɔgɔmɔ̀gɔnhomme minmíndtmREL girinyagírinyanpoidsgírinvq/adjlourdyamrphABSTR bɛbɛ́copBE kilokílonkilogramme 7575numCARDINAL , oòdtmce tigitìginmaître farisogofàrisogonchairfàrincorpssògonviande bɛbɛ́pmIPFV.AFF sesévarriver , n’n'conjsi iípers2SG yeyépmPFV.TR duwduwndúnconcessionwmrphPL inìndtmDEF litirilítirinlitre tilatílanmoitié naanináaninumquatre yeyévvoir , “ etanɔlietanɔlinETRG.FRA ” ninnìnprnceci bɛbɛ́copBE duwinduwinnETRG.FRA nanáppdans , kakàpmINF oòprnce sigiyɔrɔmasìgiyɔrɔmanendroitsìgivasseoiryɔ́rɔnlieumàppà kelenkélennumun d’d'vdonner aàpers3SG mamàppà aàpers3SG kokócopQUOT minmínprnREL , k’k'copQUOT oòprnce mamápmPFV.NEG yɛlɛmayɛ̀lɛmavchanger lɛrɛlɛ́rɛnheure filafìlanumdeux kɔnɔkɔ́nɔppà.l’intérieur k’k'pmINF aàpers3SG sɔrɔsɔ̀rɔvobtenir aàpers3SG mamápmPFV.NEG kɛkɛ́vfaire baasibáasinproblème sisídtmaucun yeyéppPP aàpers3SG tigitìginmaître mamàppà . Nka n’a tɛmɛna o hakɛ kan waati fɔlen kɔnɔna na, o tɔ bɛɛ lajɛlen bɛna ale kɛlɛ.Nkankáconjmais n’n'conjsi aàpers3SG tɛmɛnatɛmɛnavtɛ̀mɛvpassernamrphPFV.INTR oòprnce hakɛhákɛnmesure kankànppsur waatiwáatinmoment fɔlenfɔ́lennditfɔ́vdirelenmrphPTCP.RES kɔnɔnakɔ́nɔnanl'intérieurkɔ́nɔnventrenamrphLOC nanáppdans , oòprnce tɔtɔ̀nle.reste bɛɛbɛ́ɛdtmtout lajɛlenlajɛlenptcplájɛ̀vréunirlámrphCAUSjɛ̀vassemblerlenmrphPTCP.RES bɛnabɛ́nàpmFUT aleàlêpers3SG.EMPH kɛlɛkɛ̀lɛvcombattre . Alkɔli sifaya caman ɲagaminen ye: “butanoli” b’a la, o min ye fɛn ye min bɛ mɛnɛ; “metanoli” b’a la, o min dabɔra joli furakɛ kama, k’a sababuya kɛ ale bɛ mɔgɔ joli-sira dageren; “poropanoli” b’a la, o min, n’i y’a kɛ mɔtɛrɛ kɔnɔ a b a lawuli; ani siya fila wɛrɛw k’olu fara “etanoli” nin kan.AlkɔlialkɔlinETRG.FRA sifayasífayanespèce camancámanadjnombreuxcávqnombreuxmanmrphADJ ɲagaminenɲagaminenptcpɲágamivmélangernenmrphPTCP.RES yeyécopBE : “ butanolibutanolinETRG.FRA ” b’b'copBE aàpers3SG laláppdans , oòprnce minmíndtmREL yeyécopEQU fɛnfɛ́nnchose yeyéppPP minmínprnREL bɛbɛ́pmIPFV.AFF mɛnɛmɛ́nɛvallumer ; “ metanolimetanolinETRG.FRA ” b’b'copBE aàpers3SG laláppdans , oòprnce minmíndtmREL dabɔradabɔravdábɔvcommencerdánbouchebɔ́vsortirramrphPFV.INTR jolijòlinsang furakɛfúrakɛvsoignerfúranfeuillekɛ́vfaire kamakámàpppourkánncoumàppà , k’k'pmINF aàpers3SG sababuyasábabuyancausesábabuncauseyamrphABSTR kɛkɛ́vfaire aleàlêpers3SG.EMPH bɛbɛ́pmIPFV.AFF mɔgɔmɔ̀gɔnhomme joli-sirajòlisiranvaisseau.sanguin dagerendágerenvboucherdánbouchegérenvboucher ; “ poropanoliporopanolinETRG.FRA ” b’b'copBE aàpers3SG laláppdans , oòprnce minmíndtmREL , n’n'conjsi iípers2SG y’y'pmPFV.TR aàpers3SG kɛkɛ́vfaire mɔtɛrɛmɔtɛrɛnETRG.FRA kɔnɔkɔ́nɔppà.l’intérieur aàpers3SG bb'pmIPFV.AFF aàpers3SG lawuliláwulivfaire.leverlámrphCAUSwúlivse.lever ; aniàniprep/conjainsi.que siyasíyanracesínsemenceyamrphABSTR filafìlanumdeux wɛrɛwwɛrɛwadjwɛ́rɛadjautrewmrphPL k’k'pmSBJV oluòlúpersce.PL2òprncelúmrphPL2 farafàravajouter “ etanolietanolinETRG.FRA ” ninnìnprnceci kankànppsur . O tuma na, fɛn o fɛn n’o de bɛ dilan ni anw ka alikoli nin ye, farati de b’u la ka to k’u min.Oòprnce tumatùmanmoment nanáppdans , fɛnfɛ́nnchose oôconjDISTR fɛnfɛ́nnchose n’n'conjsi oòprnce dedèprtFOC bɛbɛ́pmIPFV.AFF dilandílanvfabriquer niníprep/conjet anwánwpers1PL.EMPH kakáconjPOSS alikolialikolinETRG.FRA ninnìnprnceci yeyéppPP , faratifàratinrisque dedèprtFOC b’b'copBE uùpers3PL laláppdans kakàpmINF totóvrester k’k'pmINF uùpers3PL minmìnvboire . N’i y’a ye ko kunkolodimin misɛnni b’aw minɛ n’aw ye alikolimafɛn caman mi, o ju bɛ bɔ “metanoli” nin la, o min b’aw jolisiraw datugu, n o kɛra, joli tɛ yɛlɛn aw kunkolo la, o bɛ to k’aw dimin.N’n'conjsi iípers2SG y’y'pmPFV.TR aàpers3SG yeyévvoir kokócopQUOT kunkolodiminkunkolodiminnkùnkoloncrânekùnntêtekólonosdíminnsouffrance misɛnnimisɛnninmìsɛnvqpetitnimrphNMLZ b’b'pmIPFV.AFF awáwpers2PL.EMPH minɛmìnɛvattraper n’n'conjsi awáwpers2PL.EMPH yeyépmPFV.TR alikolimafɛnalikolimafɛnnalikolinETRG.FRAmamrphCOMfɛ́nnchose camancámanadjnombreuxcávqnombreuxmanmrphADJ mimìnvboire , oòprnce jujùnderrière bɛbɛ́pmIPFV.AFF bɔbɔ́vsortir “ metanolimetanolinETRG.FRA ” ninnìnprnceci laláppdans , oòprnce minmíndtmREL b’b'pmIPFV.AFF awáwpers2PL.EMPH jolisirawjolisirawnjòlisiranvaisseau.sanguinjòlinsangsírancheminwmrphPL datugudátuguvboucherdánbouchetúguvfermer , nn'conjet oòprnce kɛrakɛravkɛ́vfaireramrphPFV.INTR , jolijòlinsang tɛtɛ́pmIPFV.NEG yɛlɛnyɛ̀lɛnvmonter awáwpers2PL.EMPH kunkolokùnkoloncrânekùnntêtekólonos laláppdans , oòprnce bɛbɛ́pmIPFV.AFF totóvrester k’k'pmINF awáwpers2PL.EMPH dimindíminvfaire.souffrir . Nin bɛɛ kɔ, n’e mɔgɔ min bɛ kunnafoni wɛrɛ nɔfɛ dɔlɔminbana kɛlɛcogo kan, i bɛ se ka bataki ci jɛkulu dɔ ma, min sigilen b’anw fɛ yan, n’o ɲɛsinnen bɛ ka dɔlɔminbanabaatɔ dɛmɛ u ka se ka dɔlɔ bila.Ninnìnprnceci bɛɛbɛ́ɛdtmtout kɔkɔ́ppaprès , n’n'conjsi eêpers2SG.EMPH mɔgɔmɔ̀gɔnhomme minmíndtmREL bɛbɛ́copBE kunnafonikùnnafonininformationkùnntêtenáppdansfónivdétacher wɛrɛwɛ́rɛadjautre nɔfɛnɔ̀fɛ̀ppderrièrenɔ̀ntracefɛ̀ppvers dɔlɔminbanadɔlɔminbanandɔ̀lɔminnconsommation.d'alcooldɔ̀lɔnbière.de.milmìnvboirebànanmaladie kɛlɛcogokɛlɛcogonkɛ̀lɛvcombattrecógonmanière kankànppsur , iípers2SG bɛbɛ́pmIPFV.AFF sesévarriver kakàpmINF batakibàtakinlettre cicívenvoyer jɛkulujɛ̀kulungroupejɛ̀nassembléekúlunbande dɔdɔ́dtmcertain mamàppà , minmínprnREL sigilensigilenptcpsìgivasseoirlenmrphPTCP.RES b’b'copBE anwánwpers1PL.EMPH fɛfɛ̀ppvers yanyànadv/nici , n’n'conjsi oòprnce ɲɛsinnenɲɛsinnenptcpɲɛ́sínvs'orienterɲɛ́noeilsínvdirigernenmrphPTCP.RES bɛbɛ́copBE kakàpmINF dɔlɔminbanabaatɔdɔlɔminbanabaatɔndɔ̀lɔminnconsommation.d'alcooldɔ̀lɔnbière.de.milmìnvboirebànabaatɔadjmaladebànanmaladiebaamrphAG.OCCtɔmrphST dɛmɛdɛ̀mɛvaider uùpers3PL kakápmSBJV sesévarriver kakàpmINF dɔlɔdɔ̀lɔnbière.de.mil bilabìlavmettre . O jɛkulu tɔgɔ ko “alikoliki anonimu”.Oòprnce jɛkulujɛ̀kulungroupejɛ̀nassembléekúlunbande tɔgɔtɔ́gɔnnom kokócopQUOT “ alikolikialikolikinETRG.FRA anonimuanonimunETRG.FRA ” . Alikoliki anonimu kɔrɔ ye dɔlɔminbanabagatɔ tɔgɔntanw.AlikolikialikolikinETRG.FRA anonimuanonimunETRG.FRA kɔrɔkɔ́rɔndessous yeyécopEQU dɔlɔminbanabagatɔdɔlɔminbanabagatɔndɔ̀lɔminnconsommation.d'alcooldɔ̀lɔnbière.de.milmìnvboirebàna.baga.tɔadj/nmaladebànanmaladiebagamrphAG.OCCtɔmrphST tɔgɔntanwtɔgɔntanwadjtɔ́gɔntanadjanonymetɔ́gɔnnomntanmrphPRIVwmrphPL .
